title: High memory usage in API Gateway
description: API Gateway on prod is consuming 95% memory leading to slow responses.

comments.author: qa.bot
comments.body: Applied memory patch and restarted gateway.

comments.author: john.doe
comments.body: No regressions found post-deployment.

fix_summary: Memory patch v1.2.3 and service restart

title: Login timeout error in EU region
description: Users in the EU are experiencing login timeouts starting from 3:00 AM UTC.

comments.author: alice.k
comments.body: Restarted Auth Service resolved the issue.

comments.author: susan.lee
comments.body: Monitoring shows normal login activity post-restart.

fix_summary: Restart Auth Service
